title: Basic Concepts
description: Basic concepts and features of DVC.

courses.title: Data Management With DVC
courses.description: The core function of DVC is data tracking and management. Let's see how to do it.

courses.title: Tracking Data Versions
courses.description: DVC takes advantage of GIT's versioning features to keep track of the data versions.

courses.title: Sharing Data
courses.description: DVC facilitates sharing of data between different people that work on the same project.
